Instead of evolved once every 20 levels, now Starspawns can be evolved once every 10 levels from level 20 to 100, and once every 5 levels after level 100 (the total amount of materials for evolution remains the same). After the update, all of your Starspawns will be reset to level 1, and the materials that you have invested on your Starspawns will be refunded to you via mail. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience that you have brought to you. Here is the compensation for you. We wish you a pleasant gaming experience!
